data.text: @KathyReid @947thepulse @abcnews Cmarn @DarrynLyons that's pretty uncool, you got an apology. Just let it go! If, you are concerned about your public image going after a community radio station in your own hometown, is really going to make you look bad! Or is that worse!
@KathyReid @947thepulse @abcnews It's absolutely disgusting behavior on @DarrynLyons part. (And a brilliant example of the Streisand Effect)
